body:
Just saw this too.

On Fri, Jul 17, 2015 at 10:38 PM, Craig Tiller notifications@github.com
wrote:

> WARNING: ThreadSanitizer: data race (pid=7175)
>   Write of size 8 at 0x7d780000fa08 by main thread (mutexes: write M132):
>     #0 memset <null>:0 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000000a1e50)
>     #1 perform_transport_stream_op /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/channel/client_channel.c:326 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000002070a5)
>     #2 cc_start_transport_stream_op /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/channel/client_channel.c:392 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x000000204f45)
>     #3 execute_op /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/surface/call.c:1218 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000011b162)
>     #4 unlock /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/surface/call.c:579 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x000000110c1f)
>     #5 grpc_call_cancel_with_status /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/surface/call.c:1164 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000001126c9)
>     #6 grpc_call_cancel /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/surface/call.c:1155 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000001125dc)
>     #7 test_cancel_after_invoke /var/local/git/grpc/test/core/end2end/tests/cancel_after_invoke.c:162 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000001092f1)
>     #8 grpc_end2end_tests /var/local/git/grpc/test/core/end2end/tests/cancel_after_invoke.c:191 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000010897b)
>     #9 main /var/local/git/grpc/test/core/end2end/fixtures/chttp2_fake_security.c:131 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000001080bc)
> 
>   Previous read of size 8 at 0x7d780000fa08 by thread T1:
>     #0 pick_target /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/channel/client_channel.c:244 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x000000208982)
>     #1 perform_transport_stream_op /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/channel/client_channel.c:366 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000002075ed)
>     #2 continue_with_pick /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/channel/client_channel.c:157 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x000000208f52)
>     #3 background_callback_executor /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/iomgr/iomgr.c:68 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x000000130b38)
>     #4 thread_body /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/support/thd_posix.c:57 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000038dde2)
> 
>   Location is heap block of size 2704 at 0x7d780000f000 allocated by main thread:
>     #0 malloc <null>:0 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000000a076d)
>     #1 gpr_malloc /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/support/alloc.c:40 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x000000381ec0)
>     #2 grpc_call_create /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/surface/call.c:303 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000010e6e3)
>     #3 grpc_channel_create_call_internal /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/surface/channel.c:150 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000011d451)
>     #4 grpc_channel_create_call /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/surface/channel.c:158 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000011d260)
>     #5 test_cancel_after_invoke /var/local/git/grpc/test/core/end2end/tests/cancel_after_invoke.c:124 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x000000108c74)
>     #6 grpc_end2end_tests /var/local/git/grpc/test/core/end2end/tests/cancel_after_invoke.c:191 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000010897b)
>     #7 main /var/local/git/grpc/test/core/end2end/fixtures/chttp2_fake_security.c:131 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000001080bc)
> 
>   Mutex M132 (0x7d780000f998) created at:
>     #0 pthread_mutex_init <null>:0 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000000a5890)
>     #1 gpr_mu_init /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/support/sync_posix.c:44 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000038d05a)
>     #2 init_call_elem /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/channel/client_channel.c:518 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000002057c0)
>     #3 grpc_call_stack_init /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/channel/channel_stack.c:171 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000011f7c8)
>     #4 grpc_call_create /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/surface/call.c:348 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000010f0c4)
>     #5 grpc_channel_create_call_internal /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/surface/channel.c:150 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000011d451)
>     #6 grpc_channel_create_call /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/surface/channel.c:158 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000011d260)
>     #7 test_cancel_after_invoke /var/local/git/grpc/test/core/end2end/tests/cancel_after_invoke.c:124 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x000000108c74)
>     #8 grpc_end2end_tests /var/local/git/grpc/test/core/end2end/tests/cancel_after_invoke.c:191 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000010897b)
>     #9 main /var/local/git/grpc/test/core/end2end/fixtures/chttp2_fake_security.c:131 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000001080bc)
> 
>   Thread T1 (tid=7180, running) created by main thread at:
>     #0 pthread_create <null>:0 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x0000000a4481)
>     #1 gpr_thd_new /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/support/thd_posix.c:76 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x00000038dc2c)
>     #2 grpc_iomgr_init /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/iomgr/iomgr.c:98 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x000000130736)
>     #3 grpc_init /var/local/git/grpc/src/core/surface/init.c:80 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x000000130292)
>     #4 main /var/local/git/grpc/test/core/end2end/fixtures/chttp2_fake_security.c:128 (chttp2_fake_security_cancel_after_invoke_test+0x000000108052)
> 
> SUMMARY: ThreadSanitizer: data race ??:0 memset
>
